mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (isbn, title, author, publisher, publication_date, genre, rating, rental_state, copies_avilable, detail, cover_image, created_at) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{publicationDate}, #{genre}, #{rating}, #{rentalState}, #{copiesAvailable}, #{detail}, #{coverImage}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, publication_date = #{publicationDate}, genre = #{genre}, rating = #{rating}, rental_state = #{rentalState}, detail = #{detail}, cover_image = #{coverImage}, created_at = DEFAULT WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.select: SELECT b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_date AS publicationDate, b.genre, b.rating, b.rental_state AS rentalState, b.copies_avilable AS copiesAvailable, b.detail, b.cover_image AS coverImage, b.created_at AS createdAt FROM book b WHERE REPLACE(b.title, ' ', '') LIKE REPLACE(CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%'), ' ', '')
